column5: My brothers and I are planning on taking a fishing charter this summer... As of right now, not 100% sure of what species... so I'm guessing Lake Ontario for Salmon/Trouts or Lake Erie for Wallys. Can anyone recommend any charters for either? I'm leaning towards Salmon, since I can't really get out for salmon on a regular basis... but I can get out for walleyes... then again I hear Erie has some beastly walleyes. Decisions, decisions... Anyhow, any ideas are greatly appreciated.

well I feel U and ME Guide Services is about as good as it gets I have always done great while out with him he is out of Newcastle now, I am just trying to put together an outing with  him for this weekend  http://www.bayofquintewalleyefishing.com/l
Check out "We pound'em Fishing". Ryan and Dan are both great guys and will put you on Lake O Salmon and trout.  http://www.wepoundemfishing.com

Call Steve Hardcastle at Fishmasters in Dunnville. He just got a new bigger boat and is doing very well on Ontario this spring. He brings the boat back to Erie for walleye in the summer. I know of no one that has had any complaints. He has done a few TV shows with Charlie Wray and the guys from Fish'n Canada.  He is a contributor on this board.  This is his latest post here,  http://ontariofishingcommunity.com/forums/index.php?s=e7d3af71a64f83afef4aefcdf27712d0&showtopic=69616
X2 for U and Me Guide Services.with Lloyd. You'll enjoy that for sure.
Thanks fellas, I'm gonna consult the brethren and figure it all oot. I'm thinkin' U and Me since it's quite close to home... and it had double recommendations haha.
Fintastic Sportfishing - Captain Shane Thombs http://fintasticsportfishing.com/  Get Bit Sportfishing - Captain Gavin Cameron http://getbit.ca/
